column1: #Italy is suspending all flights to and from China after Two cases of confirmed #coronavirus found in Rome.::PM Conte

#ALERT: #TRAVEL_ADVISORY 
Health ministry issues travel advisory for those travelling to #China after one person each in #Thailand and #Japan have reportedly tested positive for the coronavirus after returning from China.
